column1: accepting_greeks_desc;Greece was the first Balkan country to achieve its independence from us
column2: with Balkan nationalism seemingly rising to its boiling point it may be wise to grant the Greeks more rights in order to buy time and possibly even retain our claim on Greek territory.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_with_russia_desc;Our proper place lies with Russia. Long live the Russian destiny!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
